Erik Wilde (dret@ca.com): Conclusions

(2) Follow the Web

  • The Web is the perfect decentralized information system
    • It is as good as it gets in terms of current design and technology
    • It is way ahead of the API landscape in terms of maturity and scale
  • There always is an analogy for API challenges on the Web
    • Not necessarily always the best pattern to use or follow
    • Very likely a great source of inspiration and experience
  • Developers are interested in getting their job done
    • API boundaries are not necessarily interesting for them
    • Having a consistent DX across an API landscape enhances productivity


Erik Wilde (dret@ca.com): Conclusions
